about.aboutMe: My name is Parul Charkole and I am a student attending the University of North Carolina at Charlotte.I have been making art work ever since I could remember and it is my main hobby and possible future profession. My art projects have won many awards through grade school along with awards for amateur artists. I have experience in water,oil,pastel,and acrylic painting, pencil base, and purely digital. I have started this website to share my art pieces with the world and find new clients.
